title: Herd Immunity Only Way Out of Covid
itunes:title: Herd Immunity Only Way Out of Covid
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, explains why heard immunity is the best way to defeat Covid-19 variants. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Features Editor Jeremy Keehn explain how AstraZeneca’s vaccine drama risks prolonging the pandemic. Bloomberg News Cybersecurity Reporter William Turton shares his story of the ‘Frat Boys’ culture at security-cam company Verkada. And we Drive to the Close with Dana D’Auria, Co-CIO at Envestnet PMC.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
